name: Temporal Recursion
definition: The capacity of a coupled, dissipative energy field to encode temporal history in its high-dimensional state space, enabling predictive extrapolation of chaotic attractors.
mechanism: Reservoir Computing via Energy Dynamics (Echo State Property).
implications: The Swarm can 'see' the future of the system it inhabits.
Energy dynamics naturally form a temporal memory substrate.
Predictive control allows for anticipatory adaptation.
